name: Dapenter
description:
Ever Dream of being a Toy Makers?

Dapenter is a Physics based Sandbox + Survival Simulation game,

The Game allows you to Plan your Toy Designs, Craft your Parts, Cut your Parts, Build your Toys!


Share your Creations / Idea concepts with your Friends through exchanging Save File (dapenter_save.dapenter) and let your friends enjoy playing your creations!

**** Note ****

1) You can copy this game and transfer to other PC if your current PC is not working.

2) You are permitted to VIDEO-RECORDING / SCREENSHOTS / SHARE SAVE FILES of your Creations in game FREELY.


For all my game info, visit :

Website : https://facebook.com/littlerescuemachine
